body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Walter Rogers and I am a customer service representative from Global Auto Shipping. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, Walter. My name is Joan Hernandez.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Joan. Can you please provide me with your phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five - two three six - four one eight nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Joan. Next, could you kindly provide your address for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my address is six seven eight Maple Street, Springfield.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that, Joan. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, I'm all set. Thank you for your help!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Joan. Thank you for contacting us today. Have a wonderful day!
